member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument
member.summary: Represents an Async API document

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.AsyncApi
member.summary: Gets/sets the the AsyncAPI Specification version being used. It can be used by tooling Specifications and clients to interpret the version.
member.remarks: The structure shall be major.minor.patch, where patch versions must be compatible with the existing major.minor tooling. Typically patch versions will be introduced to address errors in the documentation, and tooling should typically be compatible with the corresponding major.minor (1.0.*). Patch versions will correspond to patches of this document.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Id
member.summary: Gets/sets the identifier of the application the AsyncAPI document is defining.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Info
member.summary: Gets/sets the object that provides metadata about the API. The metadata can be used by the clients if needed.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange
member.summary: Represents the object used to configure an AMQP routing key based channel

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange.Name
member.summary: Gets/sets the name of the exchange. It MUST NOT exceed 255 characters long.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange.Type
member.summary: Gets/sets the 's type

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange.Durable
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the exchange should survive broker restarts or not.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange.AutoDelete
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the exchange should be deleted when the last queue is unbound from it.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpExchange.VirtualHost
member.summary: Gets/sets the virtual host of the exchange. Defaults to '/'.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue
member.summary: Represents the object used to configure an AMQP queue based channel

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue.Name
member.summary: Gets/sets the name of the queue. It MUST NOT exceed 255 characters long.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue.Durable
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the queue should survive broker restarts or not.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue.Exclusive
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the queue should be used only by one connection or not.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue.AutoDelete
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the queue should be deleted when the last queue is unbound from it.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Amqp.AmqpQueue.VirtualHost
member.summary: Gets/sets the virtual host of the queue. Defaults to '/'.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server
member.summary: Represents an object used to describe a message broker, a server or any other kind of computer program capable of sending and/or receiving data.
member.remarks: This object is used to capture details such as URIs, protocols and security configuration. Variable substitution can be used so that some details, for example usernames and passwords, can be injected by code generation tools.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Url
member.summary: Gets/sets the pointing to the contact information.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Protocol
member.summary: Gets/sets the protocol this URL supports for connection. Supported protocol include, but are not limited to: amqp, amqps, http, https, ibmmq, jms, kafka, kafka-secure, mqtt, secure-mqtt, stomp, stomps, ws, wss, mercure.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets/sets the version of the protocol used for connection. For instance: AMQP 0.9.1, HTTP 2.0, Kafka 1.0.0, etc.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Description
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional string describing the host designated by the URL. CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Variables
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional string describing the host designated by the URL. CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Security
member.summary: Gets/sets an of values that represent alternative security requirement objects that can be used. Only one of the security requirement objects need to be satisfied to authorize a connection or operation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Server.Bindings
member.summary: Gets/sets an object used to configure the 's s

member.summary: Represents the object used to configure a 's s

member.summary: Gets/sets the protocol-specific information for an HTTP server.

member.summary: Gets/sets the protocol-specific information for an WebSockets server.

member.summary: Gets/sets the protocol-specific information for a Kafka server.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerBindingCollection.Amqp

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Variable

member.summary: Gets/sets an of values to be used if the substitution options are from a limited set.

member.summary: Gets/sets the default value to use for substitution, and to send, if an alternate value is not supplied.
